This is Jer, but he didn't put his name in the post. lol. =P

On 13 Apr 2001, at 1:16, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> OOC: Hey guys, Im sorry I havent post much recently. I've missed out 
> on some really good chances to build some stories with you guys, but 
> I hope that I can post more soon. I will be posting regularely, but 
> not as much as I used to. Hopefully soon I can resume as I used to. 
> Alloran, as far as i'm concerened you guys can use Abominus this 
> fight. I'm sorry Kslawdogg and Roborick that my Autobots didnt reply, 
> I wish I was able to, okay well here it goes.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Firedrill/Cliffjumper/Beachcomber/Megatron/Motormaster/Headstrong/
> Tantrum.
> 
> 
> Firedrill looks to Firstaid who is rushing off, and dosent get a 
> chance to have his sentence heard by the robot. "Don't you recognize 
> me?" he asked, but it fell on deaf ears. He transformed, and race to 
> follow him.
> 
> Beachcomber ran up to Cliffjumper who was shaking his head after 
> being brought back on line and having his body repaired a 
> bit. "Thank" he mentioned, both to his former leader Hotrod, and 
> Halucigen for repairing him. He turned to Beachcomber "It's Roddy, 
> let's go help him" and before Beachomber can reply Cliffjumper leaps 
> forward, and fluidly shifts, transforming into his car mode, hitting 
> the ground with his wheels burning to propelle himself, and he heads 
> towards his former leader. Beachcomber transforms, and follows, but 
> behind him, due to his lack of speed.
> 
> Megatron Turned around noticing the situation, and his plan 
> deteriorating, "That's it, this fits into my plans terribly 
> Astroblast, luckily I had planned for this turn of evets, take us 
> down to earth". He said comanding his ship. Motormaster stepped back, 
> he knew what was coming.
> 
> OOC: Kslawdogg, can you tell me if I miss an Attack as Headstrong, 
> the post was long ago.
> 
> BIC: Headstrong leapt up into the air, two fireballs coming to close 
> for compfort. He landed as close as possible, trying to surround his 
> enemy in a wall of Headstrong's, and then each one began to swing his 
> sword in a wide arc towards Hotspot (only one will hit though as the 
> other four are holograms, if it does hit that is)
> 
> Tantrum flew up, and turned around noticing Abominus' enemy. He fired 
> two streams of lighting towards Element and fired his catalyst 
> blaster at the same time.
> 
> 
>  
>

>
